name: TheSimplestGameEver
description:
i know, might be a bad game, but give me a break, this is my first time at making anything and i want to share it with the world.

My Future upload on Itch.io il try to make it worthwhile both for me and who is going to play my game! so i hope anyone is going to stick around!

Background Music! - FeatherTape (Twitter - @FeatherTape)
